nl.esciencecenter.neon.datastructures

Class FrameBufferObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.neon.datastructures.FrameBufferObject

  • public class FrameBufferObject
extends Object
    Framebuffer object, used for rendering images without directly outputting them to the screen.
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FrameBufferObject(int width, int height, int glMultitexUnit)
      Basic constructor for FrameBufferObject.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bind(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
      Method which sets this framebuffer as the one in use for rendering.
      void delete(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
      Safely remove this FrameBufferObject completely from the opengl context.
      IntBuffer getPointer()
      Getter method for the pointer to the opengl-internal fbo.
      Texture2D getTexture()
      Getter for the internal storage texture for this FrameBufferObject.
      void init(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
      OpenGL initialization method.
      void unBind(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
      Method to unbind this (and any other) FrameBufferObject, once again outputting any render actions directly to the screen.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FrameBufferObject

        public FrameBufferObject(int width,
                 int height,
                 int glMultitexUnit)
        Basic constructor for FrameBufferObject.
        Parameters:
        width - The width for this framebuffer object and it's final output texture.
        height - The height for this framebuffer object and it's final output texture.
        glMultitexUnit - The OpenGL-internal multitexture unit to be associated with this FrameBufferObject's storage texture.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
        OpenGL initialization method. Call this before using this FrameBufferObject.
        Parameters:
        gl - The opengl instance.

      • bind

        public void bind(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
          throws UninitializedException
        Method which sets this framebuffer as the one in use for rendering.
        Parameters:
        gl - The opengl instance
        Throws:
        UninitializedException - if this FrameBufferObject was not initialized before use with the init(GL3) method.

      • getTexture

        public Texture2D getTexture()
        Getter for the internal storage texture for this FrameBufferObject.
        Returns:
        The storage texture.

      • unBind

        public void unBind(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
        Method to unbind this (and any other) FrameBufferObject, once again outputting any render actions directly to the screen.
        Parameters:
        gl - The opengl instance.

      • delete

        public void delete(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl)
        Safely remove this FrameBufferObject completely from the opengl context.
        Parameters:
        gl - The opengl instance.

      • getPointer

        public IntBuffer getPointer()
        Getter method for the pointer to the opengl-internal fbo.
        Returns:
        The fboPointer.
